## SPPT archive

sppt is an [R](https://www.r-project.org) package that implements several
Spatial Point Pattern Tests.

This repository is an archive of earlier `sppt` builds. The most recent version
of `sppt` is always found on https://github.com/wsteenbeek/sppt.
